name: Wishful Companion
author: WishfulThemes

sections.description:
Wishful Companion gives you access to demo import for WishfulThemes themes.

License

Wishful Companion uses ‘One Click Demo Import’ plugin script
https://github.com/proteusthemes/one-click-demo-import

sections.installation:
*** From your WordPress dashboard ***

  1. Upload wishful-companion to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Done!

short_description: Wishful Companion add extra features to all WishfulThemes themes like demo import and other widgets.
